Charmaine Mujeri bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Zimbabwe
N'afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Movie Academy Awards

Mujeri bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 2017 Harare International Festival of the Arts N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu, Ruvajena iji mee ka a mara banyere ọgụ nke ndị na-arịa ọrịa albinism. N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri, Cooked Up

E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ofe Afrịka, ọ bụkwa onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye site na National Art Merit Awards (NAMA) na Zimbabwe International Film Festival (ZIFF). N'afọ 2020, ọrụ Mujeri na ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Mirage mere ka a họpụta ya na AMAA maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma
Ihe nkiri ahụ bụkwa ihe ngosi mbụ maka ihe nlereanya, Malaika Mushandu
Na mmepụta mmekorita ya na USAID Shaina, Mujeri bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe iji wulite ikike nke ụmụ agbọghọ na Zimbabwe.
